name: Dry Dog Food Beef Flavor
description: High-protein dry dog food with real beef and added vitamins.

productDetail.description: Complete and balanced nutrition for adult dogs with crunchy kibbles and beef flavor.
detailedDescription: Formulated by pet nutritionists to support overall health.
Feeding guide on the pack depending on weight and activity level.
Store in a cool dry place and reseal for freshness.

name: Grain-Free Cat Salmon
description: Grain-free dry cat food with salmon and sweet potato.

productDetail.description: Supports healthy digestion and a shiny coat with salmon oil.
detailedDescription: Suitable for adult cats of all breeds.
Transition gradually when switching from other food.
Provide fresh water at all times.

name: Cozy Plush Pet Bed (M)
description: Round donut-shaped plush bed ideal for small to medium pets.

productDetail.description: Ultra-soft faux fur with raised rim for head and neck support.
detailedDescription: Diameter ~60cm, suitable up to 12kg pets.
Remove inner cushion before washing for best results.
Perfect for cats and small dogs who love to curl up.

name: Anti-Shed Pet Shampoo
description: Gentle cleansing shampoo with aloe vera reduces shedding and odors.

productDetail.description: pH-balanced formula safe for frequent use on dogs and cats.
detailedDescription: Wet coat thoroughly, apply shampoo, lather and rinse well.
Avoid contact with eyes and ears.
Follow with conditioner for extra softness.

name: Portable Metal Pet Cage (L)
description: Foldable metal crate with double doors and removable tray.

productDetail.description: Ideal for training and safe transport with secure latches.
detailedDescription: Size 90x60x65cm fits medium to large dogs.
Cover with a blanket to create a cozy den.
Assemble in minutes with no tools required.

name: Reflective Harness & Leash
description: No-pull harness with reflective straps and matching leash.

productDetail.description: Adjustable straps distribute pressure evenly for comfort.
detailedDescription: Measure chest girth before choosing a size.
Hand wash and air dry for longevity.
Ideal for training energetic dogs.

name: Interactive Feather Cat Toy
description: Automatic rotating feather toy keeps cats entertained.

productDetail.description: USB rechargeable with multiple speed modes.
detailedDescription: Place on a flat surface and supervise playtime.
Charge for 2 hours for up to 8 hours of play.
Replace feathers when worn.

name: Wet Food Chicken Stew
description: Canned chicken stew with vegetables for adult dogs.

productDetail.description: Serve alone or mix with dry food for variety.
detailedDescription: Refrigerate unused portion and use within 3 days.
Follow feeding guide based on weight.
Always provide fresh water.

name: Cat Litter Box with Lid
description: Covered litter box with carbon filter to reduce odors.

productDetail.description: Flip-top lid for easy cleaning and deep base to prevent leaks.
detailedDescription: Place in a quiet corner to encourage use.
Replace filter every 2-3 months.
Use clumping litter for best results.

name: Milk Replacer Powder
description: Nutritional milk replacer for newborn and orphaned puppies.

productDetail.description: Fortified with vitamins and minerals to support growth.
highlightsList: Use as supplement for pregnant dogs
detailedDescription: Mix with warm water according to instructions.
Feed with bottle or bowl depending on age.
Consult vet for feeding schedule.

name: Calming Pet Bed Cave (S)
description: Covered cave-style bed that helps reduce anxiety.

productDetail.description: Soft plush with removable cushion and anti-slip bottom.
detailedDescription: Great for cats and toy breeds up to 6kg.
Place in a quiet area to create a safe spot.
Foldable for travel.

name: Hypoallergenic Shampoo
description: Fragrance-free gentle shampoo for sensitive skin.

productDetail.description: Soothes itchy skin and reduces dander without harsh chemicals.
detailedDescription: Use lukewarm water and avoid chilling after bath.
Dry thoroughly with towel.
Safe for kittens over 8 weeks.

name: Small Animal Carrier Cage
description: Lightweight plastic carrier with metal door for travel.

productDetail.description: Comfortable top handle and ventilation on all sides.
highlightsList: Fits airline under-seat in cabin (check airline)
detailedDescription: Use a soft blanket inside for comfort.
Ideal for vet visits and short trips.
Max load 8kg.

name: Leather Dog Harness (M)
description: Premium leather harness with metal hardware.

productDetail.description: Elegant and durable with comfortable padding.
detailedDescription: Condition leather occasionally to keep supple.
Remove when swimming or bathing.
Measure chest for proper fit.

name: Dental Chew Toys (3-Pack)
description: Durable rubber chew toys that help clean teeth.

productDetail.description: Textured surfaces massage gums and reduce plaque.
detailedDescription: Supervise use; replace if damaged.
Great for fetch and solo play.
Helps relieve boredom.

productDetail.description: Perfect for training and rewarding good behavior.
highlightsList: Easy to break into small pieces
detailedDescription: Use as treat only; not a complete meal.
Keep sealed to maintain freshness.
Great topper for picky eaters.

name: Cooling Gel Pet Mat
description: Self-cooling mat keeps pets comfortable during hot days.

productDetail.description: Pressure-activated gel cooling—no electricity or water needed.
detailedDescription: Place in shade for best effect.
Supervise if pet chews beds.
Replace if punctured.

name: Cat Teaser Wand with Bells
description: Flexible teaser wand with feathers and bells.

productDetail.description: Encourages exercise and bonding with your cat.
detailedDescription: Do not leave cat unattended with wand.
Store safely after play to prolong life.
A must-have for active cats.
